title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the comprehensive project requirements. This includes the types of codebases to be optimized (e.g., JavaScript, Python, C++), specific performance metrics, readability standards (e.g., complexity score, cyclomatic complexity), maintainability goals (e.g., reducing technical debt, increasing code quality), and any industry-specific requirements. Additionally, determine the AI system's ability to suggest refactoring opportunities and implement approved changes across various programming languages.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including components for code analysis, optimization algorithms, refactoring tools, and user interfaces.

title: Develop Code Analysis and Parsing Module
description: Implement a module to parse and analyze existing codebases, extracting relevant information for optimization.

title: Implement Optimization Algorithms
description: Develop algorithms and techniques for optimizing code performance, readability, and maintainability based on the defined requirements.

title: Build Refactoring Tools
description: Create tools and utilities for automatically refactoring code based on the optimization suggestions.

title: Develop User Interface
description: Design and implement a user-friendly interface for interacting with the CodeOptimizer system, including code upload, analysis configuration, and refactoring approval.

title: Implement Security Measures
description: Ensure the system adheres to best security practices, including input validation, access control, and secure data handling.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Establish a CI/CD pipeline for automated testing, building, and deploying the CodeOptimizer system.

title: Develop Test Suite
description: Create a comprehensive test suite to validate the functionality and performance of the CodeOptimizer system.

title: Write Documentation
description: Prepare user guides, developer documentation, and other relevant materials for the CodeOptimizer system.
